name: Linked Universe
description:
A VR Oculus Space puzzle game where you have to link the planets to access to the next level!

The only things you need to know are : Hand Trigger (the one on the side of Touch Controller)  to catch planets, and release it to place the planet or you can throw them with a throw gesture while releasing the hand trigger!

-yes I know for the double ask to press A, sorry :(
